message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible product for $12,000. I think it's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll love it!
Alice, thanks for the offer, but that's a bit high for me. I'm interested in the product, but I'd be willing to pay closer to $9,000.

I understand you're looking to save some money, Bob. However, I've got to make a profit, so I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer it to you for $11,000. It's a fair price, considering the value you'll get from the product.
I appreciate you coming down a bit, Alice.  To be honest, $10,000 is really the most I can justify spending on this. What do you say?

I can see you're really interested in the product, Bob, and I appreciate your honesty about your budget. I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer it to you for $11,500. This is the lowest I can go, considering the value it brings to you.
Alice, I appreciate you working with me on the price.  I'm still a little hesitant at $11,500. How about we split the difference and settle at $10,750?

I'm not willing to meet you halfway this time, Bob. I think $10,750 is still a bit too low for me. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to get closer to the value I know the product has for you. I can offer it to you for $12,250. This is my final offer, and I'm confident you'll see the value in it.
